testcase.name: Free CRM Create a new deal scenario
testcase.system-out: Given User is already on login page.........................................passed When Title of login page is CRMPRO - CRM software for customer relationship management, sales, and support..passed Then User enters username and password......................................passed Then User clicks on login botton............................................passed Then User on home page......................................................passed Then User move to new deal page.............................................passed Then User enters deal details...............................................passed And Quit the chrome.........................................................passed
